description:
Saburo and Keroro bet the Earth on whether the human or the frog team can win a bowling match!  And then Keroro`s dismayed by his platoon`s lack of enthusiasm about the regular invasion meeting, so he turns into a giant monster to go on a rampage.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Clash, Star Circular Violence Tool Tournament / Keroro, My Super Decisive Plan!?
ケロロ 激突☆暴輪具(スタアボウリング)大会 であります / ケロロ 我輩, 超決断計画!? であります
